description: Holden Phillips"The Fearless"Ht: 5'10" WT: 150lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0)Tyler Sweet"The Terror"Ht: 5'7" WT: 135lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Hot stud Tyler "The Terror" Sweet brings his cocky attitude to NK in his very first match. title: Tyler "The Terror" Sweet vs Holden "The Fearless" Phillips
